item.title: On Going Local: Relationships
item.description: On Going Local is a (short) series that Iâ€™m running which will attempt to look at my life from an objective perspective as I transition from and NGO worker into an entrepreneur here in the developing world. Relationships here in Somaliland are odd, to say the least. There are two main identifiable cultural divergences. The first is that many relationships are deeper here in Somaliland than similar relationships would be back home.
